name.ja: ディノベーダー・ドクス

text.en: If you control 2 or more Dinosaur monsters: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can Tribute 1 Level 4 or lower monster; Special Summon 1 Dinosaur monster from your Deck that is 2 Levels higher or lower than the Tributed monster, but destroy it during the End Phase. You can only use this effect of "Dinovader Docus" once per turn. You can only Special Summon "Dinovader Docus(s)" once per turn.
